Ω.intent: Project or restrict a state onto the globally allowed/normalized subspace.

Ω\_norm.intent: Compute a global norm or invariant (e.g., total energy, total probability, global semantic mass).

Ω\_constraint.intent: Enforce a specific global constraint (e.g., Ω\_norm \= 1).

Ω\_inv.intent: Define quantities that remain invariant under χ-evolution when Ω is applied.

Ωχ\_H.intent: Hamiltonian-like generator of χ-evolution under global constraint Ω.

Ωχ\_L.intent: Lagrangian-like action functional encoding χ-evolution consistent with Ω.
